title: Peloton Pulls Chris Noth Ad After Misconduct Accusations Surface
sub_head: ‘Every single sexual assault accusation must be taken seriously,’ exercise-equipment maker says
body:
Peloton Interactive Inc . has removed a viral ad featuring “Sex and the City” actor Chris Noth after sexual-assault accusations against him were published online.
“Every single sexual assault accusation must be taken seriously,” said a Peloton spokeswoman Thursday. “We were unaware of these allegations when we featured Chris Noth in our response to HBO’s reboot. As we seek to learn more, we have stopped promoting this video and archived related social posts.”
